title: Guts Outside 4: Sadistic Syndrome
overview: A parallel reality, where Russia lives in an even bloodier capitalism than now. Worker Igor no longer sees the meaning in life and collects money for euthanasia - a “legal” way to commit suicide. However, one day, his friend is killed in front of his eyes, and he realizes that he wants to live to take revenge... Parallel plot line: Elmer's girlfriend becomes pregnant, and Elmer's child inside her grows very quickly, causing pain to the mother. But they don’t even think about family happiness because both government agencies and a dangerous robotic exterminator are hunting them...
